task.name: v.parallel
task.description: Creates parallel line to input vector lines.

parameter.name: input
parameter.description: Nombre del mapa vectorial de entrada.

parameter.name: output
parameter.description: Nombre para el mapa vectorial de salida.

parameter.name: distance
parameter.description: Offset along major axis in map units

parameter.name: minordistance
parameter.description: Offset along minor axis in map units

parameter.name: angle
parameter.description: Angle of major axis in degrees

value.name: left
value.description: Parallel line is on the left

value.name: right
value.description: Parallel line is on the right

parameter.name: tolerance
parameter.description: Tolerance of arc polylines in map units

flag.name: overwrite
flag.description: Permite a los archivos de salida sobrescribir los archivos existentes.
